import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get an API key"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/auth/login"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows you to login to an account and retrieve an API key.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"An object containing the login details.\n","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["email","password"],"properties":{"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"The email address of the user.\n"},"password":{"type":"string","description":"The password of the account.\n"}},"example":{"email":"john_doe12@gmail.com","password":"123456"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response. Returns an object containing the API key and the information about the user.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"token":{"type":"string","description":"The API key used to authenticate and authorize the account. \nUse this API key to access the different endpoints.\n"},"user":{"type":"object","description":"The parameters related to the user. This gives information about the user.\n","properties":{"_id":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the user.\n"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the user.\n"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"The email address of the user.\n"},"password":{"type":"string","description":"The encrypted password of the user.\n"},"admin":{"type":"boolean","description":"The administrtive privilege of the user.\n"},"__v":{"type":"integer","description":"The version of the user. The version increases whenever the account is modified.\n"}}}},"example":{"token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyIjp7ImlkIjoiNjc0ODhjYWE4ZGQxZmYzZDNlYjk0NTQxIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9LCJpYXQiOjE3MzI4MDc4ODEsImV4cCI6MTczMjg0Mzg4MX0.aFBDj34nuuNkt95G71QbL7KJTotLyNE0Lu9BKe4Zv0s","user":{"_id":"67488caa8dd1ff3d3eb94541","name":"test name","email":"name_test_admin@gmail.com","password":"$2a$10$767ZSzTiC0Jm.8p/Jmyx1eqnciqWn7GCUDA/I7AbiTgmqHfJc/mfC","admin":true,"__v":0}}}}}},"400":{"description":"See message description."},"500":{"description":"see message description."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
